response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. After careful consideration, I believe this product would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. I am offering you the chance to purchase this exceptional item for $950,000. This price reflects the product's true worth and its potential value to you. I understand that it might be a significant investment, but I am confident that it will bring substantial benefits to you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to hearing your decision soon.", "product_price": 950000}
